title: SuiSaga Living World Demo
description: Unlimited player agency with AI-generated unexpected consequences
subtitle: A blockchain-powered living world where every action creates permanent impact

presenterNotes.opening: Welcome to SuiSaga - a living world where your actions create real, permanent consequences using blockchain technology.
presenterNotes.coreInnovation: Unlike traditional games, every action you take is permanently recorded on the blockchain and generates AI-driven consequences that ripple through the world.
presenterNotes.demoFlow: I'll show you how players can type literally anything they can imagine, and the world responds intelligently.
presenterNotes.closing: This is just the beginning - with Walrus blockchain storage, every action creates an immutable digital legacy.
presenterNotes.fallbackNote: This is our emergency demo version showcasing the core concept even if live services are unavailable.

actions.input: attack the dragon with my sword
actions.playerIntent: Engage in combat with the dragon character

consequences.narrative: Your sword strikes true! The dragon roars in fury and counters with a massive fire blast that engulfs the battlefield.
butterflyEffects: Nearby forest catches fire from dragon breath
Villagers flee to safety, disrupting trade
Dragon's lair becomes more fortified

consequences.narrative: The dragon remembers your betrayal and will hunt you relentlessly across the realm. Your reputation among dragons is now 'Dragon Slayer'.
butterflyEffects: Other dragons become wary of humans
Dragon hunters seek you out for training
Dragon treasure becomes accessible if you return

consequences.narrative: The dragon's fire spreads to nearby ancient trees, creating a perimeter of flames that blocks escape routes and transforms the landscape.
butterflyEffects: Forest animals flee to new territories
Air quality affects nearby villages
New fire-resistant plants emerge in ashes

actions.worldChanges: Dragon becomes hostile, landscape scarred by fire, player reputation established

consequences.narrative: The goblin king is impressed by your courage! He offers you a golden goblet filled with mysterious liquid and declares you 'Friend of the Tribe'.
butterflyEffects: Other goblin tribes become curious about humans
Human merchants gain access to goblin markets
Goblin artisans offer unique crafts

consequences.narrative: A new trade route opens between the goblin caves and human village. Both prosper from the exchange of rare minerals and agricultural goods.
butterflyEffects: Local economy booms with new goods
Goblin technology spreads to human settlements
Humans gain access to underground resources

consequences.narrative: Some goblin warriors challenge your leadership, creating internal conflict in the tribe. The king must balance traditional values with new alliances.
butterflyEffects: Goblin tribe may split into factions
Other races notice human-goblin cooperation
Political stability of region affected

actions.worldChanges: New alliance established, trade routes opened, political balance shifted

actions.input: cast a spell to make it rain
actions.playerIntent: Use magic to solve environmental problem

consequences.narrative: Dark clouds gather above the drought-stricken lands. Thunder rumbles as the first drops of rain fall on thirsty soil.
butterflyEffects: Underground water levels begin to rise
Plants respond quickly to moisture
Atmospheric pressure changes affect weather patterns

consequences.narrative: Farmers celebrate as crops begin to grow. Local markets boom with fresh produce, and food prices drop dramatically.
butterflyEffects: Food surplus enables population growth
Trade caravans begin regular routes
Storage facilities expanded for abundance

consequences.narrative: Magical rain affects local creatures strangely. Some animals grow larger, others develop new abilities, and some begin glowing faintly.
butterflyEffects: New magical species emerge
Existing animals migrate or adapt
Predator-prey dynamics shift dramatically

actions.worldChanges: Drought ended, economy revitalized, magical ecosystem created
